review: I got this item for $24 thanks to the Prime Day Sale, so I couldn't pass up that deal! We used to have our wii hooked up to the TV for Netflix purposes. The Fire Stick is really handy because it plugs into the TV so it isn't taking up valuable entertainment center space. I don't like how it has to stay plugged into an outlet because that cord hanging is unsightly, but I can deal with it. Setup is extremely easy. Very user friendly. I like all of the apps that are included.
author: Courtney M
